title: 184. Victorian Writers On Why They Write
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: As our Victorian friends are doing it  tough in Stage 4 lockdown, Dani Vee has put together a compilation of Victorian writers discussing why they write and the writing process. This episode features Amie Kaufman, Jay Kristoff, Kirsten Alexander, Danielle Binks, Felice Arena, JP Pomare, Nicole Hayes, Adrian Beck, Sarah Bailey and Gabriel Bergmoser.
itunes:subtitle: As our Victorian friends are doing it  tough in Sâ€¦
